Data: 2.30 pm: Time for the toss. Australia have won the toss and opted to bat. Shaun Marsh, Shane Watson, Stuart Clark, Andrew Symonds and Ben Hilfenhaus are all in. Younis Khan says he would have batted first had he won, and says a score of around 260-odd would be chaseable. Shoaib Akhtar is back! We'll get
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run dropped into the off side, slightly short on the off, defended solidly
Umar Gul to Marsh, 1 run straying on the pads, tickled down to fine leg, Australia are away
Umar Gul to Haddin, 1 run banged in short on middle, rocked back, rolled his wrists over it and played it down to fine leg to get off the mark
Umar Gul to Marsh, 1 leg bye on the pads again, pitched outside leg and came in, tried to clip it fine, got hit on the pads and scrambled a leg bye
Umar Gul to Haddin, no run back of a length on the off and darted back in, struck him high on the pads as he tried to defend forward, was going over
Umar Gul to Haddin, no run short of a good length on the off, bowled at 139 kmph, tried to defend on the back foot, got an inside edge on his thighs
Shoaib Akhtar to Marsh, no run a loosener, bowled at 140 kmph, left alone, just warming up there
Shoaib Akhtar to Marsh, no run short of a good length outside off, held its line, left alone to the keeper
Shoaib Akhtar to Marsh, no run similar line, bowled at 141.5 kmph, rose up and moved away a hint, leaves it be, settling into his rhythm now
Shoaib Akhtar to Marsh, no run much fuller and spat off the pitch, good pace, bowled at 143 kmph, Kamran Akmal collected it almost in front of his face
Shoaib Akhtar to Marsh, 1 run full on the pads, worked away to fine leg, handled well
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run back of a length on middle, gets back and defends it solidly towards mid-on
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run testing line outside off, rocks back and taps that to point
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run fullish outside off, gets forward and leaves it be, inviting him into the drive but Marsh isn't tempted
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run short of a good length on the off stump and moving away, shoulders arms to that one
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run driven firmly but straight to cover, full on the off and he pushes at it with a flourish but is unable to beat the in-field
Umar Gul to Marsh, 2 runs short of a good length outside off, gets back and runs it down wide of Shoaib at third man, rushes back for the second as he's a little slow to react, no surprises there
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run banged in short, pulled away to square leg, kept it down all the way through

Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, FOUR runs Haddin's into the act now, waited patiently for the first three overs and seized on it as soon as he got a chance, just a fraction short and he was onto it quickly, got back and crashed it through the off side wide of point
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run pushed him back with a shorter one on middle, defended cautiously back to the bowler
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run on the off stump, maintaining a shortish length, dabbed towards cover off the back foot
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run a hint of desperation there, pushed it fuller on the off, he made room and swatted it down the ground to mid-off, didn't time it well enough
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, 1 wide short outside leg, backs away and earns a wide, straying in line but he's working up some good pace here, decent start after a long enough break
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, 1 run well run, just tapped it wide of cover and rushed off to the other end, sound start, chanceless so far, they've taken their time
Shoaib Akhtar to Marsh, no run kept a little low and got to the keeper to the bounce, good length outside off and let it through with shouldered arms
Umar Gul to Haddin, 1 run tapped wide of midwicket for a single
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run probing him outside off, pushed firmly to cover
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run on the off stump, a touch fuller, defended watchfully towards cover

Umar Gul to Marsh, 1 run on middle and leg, driven wide of midwicket and rushes off for a single, a shy at the stumps, misses and Marsh dives full length to get back, probably did his hamstring, he's in some pain now
Umar Gul to Haddin, no run on the off stump and shot away from the batsman, bowled at 138.9 kmph, Haddin handled it well, getting back and opening the face to guide it to point
Umar Gul to Haddin, 1 run a touch too full, and straight on middle, clipped away to fine leg
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run slightly short of a length and moved back in, hit through the line, pushing it straight to mid-off, a touch uppish but safe
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, 1 run bringing it back in again, got back and punched it wide of mid-off for a quick single
Shoaib Akhtar to Marsh, 1 run slower one, bowled at 117 kmph, picked it, it's a touch full on the off, opens the face to play it down to third man
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run short outside off and gets some good bounce, Haddin lets it through
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, no run slower ball on middle, bowled at 113.2 kmph, dabbed in front of midwicket, decides against the single
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, 1 run pushes at it across the line, much fuller on the off, mistimes it short of mid-off but there's enough time to steal a single
Umar Gul to Haddin, no run short of a good length on the off, defended towards cover on the back foot
Umar Gul to Haddin, FOUR runs well struck, on middle and leg, pushed it through the line wide of the bowler, hit it firmly and beat the gap between mid-on and mid-off, nicely timed
Umar Gul to Haddin, no run short on middle, swatted down to mid-on, should have dispatched that, missed out
Umar Gul to Haddin, no run full on the off stump, low full toss, times it well but hits it straight to mid-off, uncharacteristic of Haddin really, unusually sedate here
Umar Gul to Haddin, no run hmm, it

Umar Gul to Haddin, SIX runs that was coming, a touch too full from Gul and Haddin picks the length early, strikes it cleanly over long-on for a big one, was in the slot and he didn't waste the opportunity this time, that'll ease the pressure a little
Shoaib Akhtar to Marsh, no run loosener, at 119.6 kmph, gets back and drops it into the off side

Shoaib Akhtar to Marsh, FOUR runs a touch unlucky there, short outside off, tries to chop it past point, gets an under-edge bang into the ground and over slip for a boundary, the hamstring's troubling him
Shoaib Akhtar to Marsh, no run good length on middle and off, defended comfortably to cover
Shoaib Akhtar to Marsh, 1 run short on middle and leg, turned wide of midwicket for a single
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, 1 run slower one, bowled short outside off, at 118 kmph, run down to third man
Shoaib Akhtar to Marsh, no run 143.5 kmph, negotiated well, good length on the off and he blocks it to cover
Umar Gul to Haddin, no run driven straight to short cover, presented the full face but there's a fielder positioned exactly for that
Umar Gul to Haddin, 1 run short and wide, makes room and chops it away towards third man
Umar Gul to Marsh, no run good length on middle and off, gets forward and drops it back to the bowler
Umar Gul to Marsh, 3 runs shot! Marsh is away now, slower one but too full on the pads, gets forward and drives it beautifully wide of midwicket, nice wristy stroke that, gets three
Umar Gul to Haddin, 1 run back of a length, gets back and dabs it down to third man, runs coming a lot more freely now

Umar Gul to Marsh, 2 runs, OUT run out, excellent throw from the deep, Marsh has to go, chopped it down wide of a diving point, cover gives chase, drags it back in and returns a throw on the half-volley to Nasir Jamshed at the non-striker's end, there's always three there but Hauritz is slow on his
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, no run bouncer banged in on middle at around 142 kmph, ducks under it well
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, 1 run driven into the leg side for a single to get off the mark
Shoaib Akhtar to Haddin, 1 run short outside off, made room and chopped it down to third man
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, 2 runs lucky, full and wide, chased it, bowled at 144 kmph, got an inside edge wide of the off stump for a couple short of fine leg
Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, no run back of a length on the off, blocked to cover off the front foot

Shoaib Akhtar to Watson, FOUR runs banged in short and he cashes in this time, gets back and pulls it away with disdain over square leg for a boundary, a touch quicker there, around 145 kmph but it didn't matter
Umar Gul to Haddin, no run slower ball bowled on a length outside off, pushed through to cover
Umar Gul to Haddin, no run full on the off, driven straight to cover
Umar Gul to Haddin, no run tickled off the back foot towards midwicket
Umar Gul to Haddin, no run short outside off and he backed away from it
Umar Gul to Haddin, 1 run overpitched on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on

Umar Gul to Watson, 1 run almost a waist-high no ball but it isn't given, plays it well though, guiding it to third man, the umpires had a look at each other and both agreed it was a legitimate delivery
Iftikhar to Watson, no run overpitched on middle, driven down the ground to mid-on, firmly struck but couldn't beat the gap
Iftikhar to Watson, 1 run length on the pads, flicked away to fine leg
Iftikhar to Haddin, 1 run made room and crunched it past mid-off for a single, as expecting a free swing of the arms but the length wasn't quite there
Iftikhar to Watson, no run back of a length on the off, pushed to cover off the back foot
Iftikhar to Watson, 3 runs short and wide and he went after it, cracked it uppishly in front of cover, three more, didn't time it well enough but still got three for it
Iftikhar to Haddin, 2 runs nicely played, opened the face there, slightly short on the off and he forced it between point and cover for a couple more
Afridi to Watson, no run short on middle and spinning away a hint, dropped on the pitch
Afridi to Watson, no run on middle, gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
Afridi to Watson, no run dipping it into the right hander and gets it to spin away, defended back to the bowler, good start
Afridi to Watson, no run yorked himself there, gave it some air and he took a couple of steps down the tack, dug it out back to Afridi
Afridi to Watson, 2 wide straying in line, pushed it wide of leg stump, tried to sweep, didn't connect but it's a wide, and a fumble from Akmal gives them one more
Afridi to Haddin, no run leading edge there, on middle and held its line, opened the face expecting it to spin away
Afridi to Haddin, no run slightly quicker through the air, bowled from back of the hand, defended on the pitch
Iftikhar to Watson, FOUR runs went after it, just a fraction short on the off, got forward and slapped it over mid-on, didn't time it all too well but well enough to find the boundary
Iftikhar to Watson, 1 run on middle and leg, the bat turns in his hand as he tries to drive down, gets it to long-on

Iftikhar to Haddin, FOUR runs superbly timed, overpitched, made a bit of room and struck it sweetly down the ground to beat mid-off, sweet sound of bat hitting ball, and a nice follow through to back it up
Iftikhar to Haddin, 1 run short on the off, punched off the back foot to cover
Iftikhar to Watson, 1 run back of a length on middle, pushed into the leg side for a single, the run-rate has hit five now
Iftikhar to Haddin, no run good comeback, attempted yorker on middle, almost gets it right, bowled at 137.2 kmph, Haddin digs it out and Iftikhar has a shy at the striker's end to ruffle the batsman
Afridi to Watson, 1 run short on leg stump, turned away behind square
Afridi to Haddin, 2 runs gave it a bit of air, tempting him to come down the track, lofted wide of long-on and deep midwicket for a couple
Afridi to Haddin, no run short on the off, dabbed towards point off the back foot
Afridi to Haddin, 1 run ticked to fine leg off the back foot, slightly short outside leg
Afridi to Watson, no run gets back and punches it to point
Afridi to Watson, SIX runs shot, just a fraction overpitched, got forward, bent low and slog-swept it well over deep midwicket, struck it cleanly, not much effort there but it was brilliantly timed
Ajmal to Haddin, no run hit away through the leg side behind square
Ajmal to Haddin, no run short on the off, punched towards cover
Ajmal to Haddin, no run threw it up and held its line as Haddin tried to chop it past point
Ajmal to Haddin, 1 run on middle and leg, slightly short, turned it away wide of short fine
Ajmal to Watson, no run flighted on the off stump, got forward and turned it wide of midwicket, wasn
Ajmal to Watson, no run slightly short on middle, spun in, played it back respectfully to the bowler, good start by Ajmal
Afridi to Haddin, 1 run tossed up outside off, driven through the line to long-off
Afridi to Watson, 1 run dragged it short on leg stump, tried to dab it down, a bit of hesitation but they grab a single
Afridi to Haddin, no run kept low., slightly short on the off, chopped down to point

Afridi to Haddin, 1 run dropped, tossed up, mistimes a slog-sweep, it's sky high and Shoaib running back from midwicket spills it, was getting away from him and he didn't judge it well enough. How costly will that prove?
Afridi to Watson, 2 runs driven off the front foot wide of long-on for a couple
Afridi to Watson, 1 run tossed up outside leg, swept down to fine leg for a single
Ajmal to Watson, 2 runs the doosra, picked it well, spun away after landing short outside off, made room, waited for it, and dabbed it wide of short third for a couple
Ajmal to Watson, no run short on middle and off, punched back to the bowler
Ajmal to Watson, no run struck firmly towards the non-striker's end, lobs off Haddin's bat straight to Younis Khan at cover
Ajmal to Watson, no run gets forward, covers the spin by closing the face and working it to midwicket
Ajmal to Watson, 2 runs short on the off, much quicker, pulled away wide of Shoaib at long-on for a couple more
Ajmal to Watson, no run whipped away but straight to midwicket, these two are keeping the scoreboard ticking nevertheless, Watson's done it better than a run-a-ball
Afridi to Haddin, 1 wide fired in down the leg side, held its line,called a wide
Afridi to Haddin, 1 run tossed up on leg stump, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
Afridi to Watson, no run flighted on middle, presents the full face and pushes it back to Afridi
Afridi to Watson, 1 run gets back and turns it away wide of square leg for a single

Afridi to Haddin, OUT Haddin goes! Gave it some air, Haddin was drawn forward and he went through with the drive, was not entirely committed to it and hit it straight to Younis who timed his jump to perfection to snap an easy one. Shoaib will be a little relieved there
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run short and wide, chops it wide of point for a single
Afridi to Watson, no run back of the hand, landed on a length on middle, reaches forward and defends
Ajmal to Clarke, 2 runs thrown up outside off, gets across the line and nudges it behind the keeper for a couple wide of fine leg
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run flighted on the off, driven through the line to long-off
Ajmal to Watson, no run slightly short on the off and spun in, was rapped high on the pads as he tried to play it down leg
Ajmal to Watson, no run quicker, bowled at 94.3 kmph, gets back and defends it back to Ajmal
Ajmal to Watson, 1 run short on the off, gets back and turns it away behind square for a single

Ajmal to Clarke, OUT the doosra does the trick, short of a length outside off, Clarke tried to open the face to run it down behind point, it spun away to take the outside edge and Akmal made no mistake
Afridi to Watson, 1 run tossed up on the off, pushed firmly down to long-off
Afridi to Symonds, 1 run Symonds off the mark, fullish on middle, flicked away to deep midwicket
Afridi to Watson, 2 runs short, got forward, got down on one knee and pulled it away between deep midwicket and deep square leg for a couple
Afridi to Watson, 1 run flighted, bowled at 110 kmph, pretty quick that, driven down to long-off
Afridi to Symonds, no run slightly short on the off, pushed to cover
Afridi to Symonds, no run short on middle and off, drops it back on the pitch, good stuff from the spinners here
Ajmal to Watson, no run tempting him outside off, leans forward and defends
Ajmal to Watson, no run gets outside the line and turns it away towards midwicket
Ajmal to Watson, no run deceived by the doosra again, short on the off and he ended up playing inside the line as it spat away
Ajmal to Watson, no run
Ajmal to Watson, 1 run flighted on leg stump, swept down to deep square leg for a single, a bit of a niggle between Watson and Ajmal here, gives him an intimidating stare as he runs down the track
Ajmal to Symonds, 1 run swept away to deep square leg again, fetched it from outside off
Afridi to Symonds, OUT Australia in a spot of bother now, the offcutter bowled from the back of the hand, short outside off, spin it, made way for a cut behind point, gloved it straight to the keeper
Afridi to Ferguson, no run quicker one, as quick as Iftikhar almost, at 130 kmph, Ferguson defended it back to the bowler
Afridi to Ferguson, no run dipping into the right hander, fullish on the off, defended
Afridi to Ferguson, 1 run gets off the mark, punches it down wide of cover for a single
Afridi to Watson, no run

Afridi to Watson, OUT He's a legpsinner, but that's actually a classic offspinner's dismissal, threw it up outside off, drawing him forward, he lunges forward to defend, the ball cuts back in sharply to beat him through the gate and the stumps are rattled
Ajmal to Ferguson, no run tossed up on middle, tickled to midwicket
Ajmal to Ferguson, no run they've failed to pick the doosra, and this is yet another instance, invited him forward and spun it away, he did well to stay rooted to the crease
Ajmal to Ferguson, no run on middle and off, defended into the off side
Ajmal to Ferguson, no run gets forward and works it away to square leg
Ajmal to Ferguson, no run shorter, on the off stump, the straighter one, played into the off side
Ajmal to Ferguson, 1 run short on the off, spun into him, he punches it wide of cover for a single
Afridi to Ferguson, no run drifting into the batsman, gets forward and dabs it to cover
Afridi to Ferguson, no run drifting into the batsman and cutting away, takes the outside edge but it lands well wide of slip
Afridi to Ferguson, no run comes on the front foot, closes the face and turns it to midwicket

Afridi to Ferguson, OUT Afridi's on a roll! Flighted outside off, Ferguson was sucked in, came forward to force it through cover, got a thick edge and Misbah snapped it well diving to his left, Australia slide further
Afridi to Hauritz, 1 run tossed up on the off, looks to dab it into the off side, gets a thick inside edge wide of midwicket for a single
Afridi to Hopes, no run short on middle and leg, pushed short of midwicket, calls for a single but is sent back
Ajmal to Hauritz, no run flighted on the off, gets forward and defends it to midwicket

Ajmal to Hauritz, OUT bowled'im!! An embarassing dismissal that, spun in sharply from outside off, he shouldered arms to that one, not expecting it to spin as much, and hears the death rattle behind him as it clips off stump
Ajmal to Bracken, 1 run the doosra, just hung his bat out and pushed it wide of point, gives the better batsman the strike
Ajmal to Hopes, 1 run the better batsman gets across and sweeps it down to fine leg
Ajmal to Bracken, no run tossed up on the off, defended watchfully to cover
Ajmal to Bracken, no run flighted on the off again, defends it solidly in front of cover, nicely done but his side is tottering
Afridi to Hopes, 2 runs short on middle and leg, tickles it behind short fine for two runs
Afridi to Hopes, no run
Afridi to Hopes, no run gets forward and taps it back onto the pitch
Afridi to Hopes, no run pushed off the back foot into the off side
Afridi to Hopes, no run goes for the slog sweep, misses, the googly, didn
Afridi to Hopes, 1 wide fired down the leg side, called a wide
Afridi to Hopes, 1 run gets back and works it away behind square for a single
Ajmal to Hopes, no run short of a length outside off and spinning in, defended off the back foot to cover
Ajmal to Hopes, no run very slow through the air, on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Ajmal to Hopes, 1 run the straighter one, gets back and punches it towards deep cover
Ajmal to Bracken, no run spins in to beat the outside edge, goes through with the drive but plays inside the line
Ajmal to Bracken, no run spun away, full on the off stump and cutting away this time, follows it up with a doosra, gets forward to defend but it spits away
Ajmal to Bracken, no run pushed into the off side o the front foot
Afridi to Hopes, 1 run
Afridi to Bracken, no run flighted on the off, defended to cover
Afridi to Bracken, no run drops it back onto the pitch, it's full on middle, dabs it back

Afridi to Bracken, OUT five-for for Afridi! Done in by the googly again, tossed up outside off and Bracken's eyes lit up, got forward to drive it forcefully through cover, misread the spin and was bowled through the gate. His third five-wicket haul, and his first against Australia
Afridi to Clark, no run quicker one bowled on the off, slapped to cover
Afridi to Clark, 1 run gets back and turns it wide of short fine to keep the strike
Ajmal to Clark, no run doosra again, shuffled well outside off and played across the line, was beaten and the Australian coach Nielsen has a big smile on his face
Ajmal to Clark, no run short on the off and spinning in, pushed back to the bowler
Ajmal to Clark, no run beaten all ends up, doosra again, much closer to the off stump and zipped away as he played across the line
Ajmal to Clark, no run tossed up on the off, defended with a reach
Ajmal to Clark, no run got to the pitch and drove it through the line wide of mid-off
Ajmal to Clark, no run doosra again and got some bounce this time, spat off the pitch to beat the outside edge as he tried to defend that off the back foot
Afridi to Hopes, no run tossed up on middle and off, held it back a touch, defended with a lunge
Afridi to Hopes, 1 run Hopes has hope in the tail-enders, works it away wide of square leg for a single
Afridi to Clark, 1 run tossed up on the off, driven uppishly towards long-off
Afridi to Hopes, 1 run short on middle, gets back and whips it away to deep midwicket

Afridi to Clark, OUT Afridi gets his best figures in ODIs! He's mastered the googly here, tossed it up outside off, landed on a good length and zipped back in take the off stump as Clarke was beaten through the gate as he came forward to defend
Afridi to Hilfenhaus, no run end of a superb spell, rapped on the pads off the googly again but was struck outside the line, huge cheer from a partisan crowd here
Ajmal to Hopes, 2 runs flighted on middle, driven towards deep midwicket for a couple
Ajmal to Hopes, no run bowled it flatter this time and it spun back in to strike him on the pads as he played across the line, was hit outside off
Ajmal to Hopes, no run tossed up this time and is struck on the back pad as he tries to sweep, but again, it's outside the line
Ajmal to Hopes, no run doosra, almost does him in, short on the off and he plays straight as it zips away to beat the outside edge
Ajmal to Hopes, 1 run pushed off the back foot to long-on for a single
Ajmal to Hilfenhaus, no run the straighter one, plays inside the line, gets the outside edge and it drops short of second slip
Umar Gul to Hopes, no run darted back in, bowled at 132.2 kmph, got forward and defended it back to the bowler
Umar Gul to Hopes, FOUR runs shot! Too late, but was worth a watch, overpitched, gets on the front foot and creams it through the off side wide of cover
Umar Gul to Hopes, no run attempted yorker on middle, bowled at 134.9 kmph, dug out into the off side
Umar Gul to Hopes, no run short on middle, gets back and punches it to cover
Umar Gul to Hopes, no run full on the off, bunts it straight to mid-off, no single taken

Umar Gul to Hopes, 1 run missed run out, full toss on middle, dabs it to cover and hesitates, Hilfenhaus is halfway down the pitch only to watch Hopes send him back, a shy at the stumps but misses, and they get overthrows, had enough time to take aim there, should have scored!
Ajmal to Hopes, 1 run single off the first ball again, whipped away to deep midwicket
Ajmal to Hilfenhaus, no run almost, beaten by the doosra for the umpteenth time, spun away to evade the outside edge as he came forward to defend
Ajmal to Hilfenhaus, no run and again, played inside the line to that one, opened the face but made no contact
Ajmal to Hilfenhaus, no run short on the off and spun back in to catch him on his thighs as he tried to play it off the back foot
Ajmal to Hilfenhaus, no run reached forward to defend on the off side

Ajmal to Hilfenhaus, no run just fell short of Nasir Jamshed, flighted, drew him forward, probably the straighter one there, dabbed at it, got the outside edge and Jamshed, who's a little too deep at slip, failed to get down in time
Umar Gul to Hopes, 1 wide down the leg side, gifts them a run
Umar Gul to Hopes, 1 run back of a length, punched to long-off on the back foot
Umar Gul to Hilfenhaus, no run full toss on the off stump, struck straight to mid-off, they need to continue with spin here, Gul's relatively easy, that's what it seems
Umar Gul to Hilfenhaus, 1 run gets an under edge short of Akmal and they steal a quick single
Umar Gul to Hopes, FOUR runs some important runs here, slightly full on the off, gets forward and swings it over midwicket, used his wrists nicely there, dealing with the seamer quite well
Umar Gul to Hopes, 1 run yorker, Hopes was expecting that, made way and dabbed it towards third man for a single
Umar Gul to Hilfenhaus, no run low full toss on middle and leg, bowled at 137 kmph, pushed to midwicket
Shoaib Akhtar to Hopes, 1 wide starts off with an absolutely horrendous wide outside off, why is Malik not being given a bowl?
Shoaib Akhtar to Hopes, no run full and wide, bowled at 140.2 kmph, makes room and reaches for it, misses
Shoaib Akhtar to Hopes, no run yorker length on middle, pushed wide of the bowler, decides against the single
Shoaib Akhtar to Hopes, no run slower one bowled short outside off, at 113 kmph, slapped to cover
Shoaib Akhtar to Hopes, FOUR runs cuts that away, its a poor ball really, makes room and slashes it behind point, these are easy runs
Shoaib Akhtar to Hopes, 2 runs well struck, an unimpressive over by Shoaib, full toss on leg stump, drills it down the ground, long-off runs across, dives, and cuts it off

Shoaib Akhtar to Hopes, FOUR runs that's bludgeoned, I don't think we'll see more of him for the rest of the innings, short and wide again and Hopes latches onto it, blazing it between point and cover to take the score to 150
Umar Gul to Hilfenhaus, 1 run short of a good length on the off, opens the face to play it down to third man and give Hopes the strike
Umar Gul to Hopes, no run yorker on middle, bowled at 140.7 kmph, dug out to cover
Umar Gul to Hopes, FOUR runs short on middle and he deals with it well, gets back and pulls it away over square leg to beat the fielder in the deep, these two have added 33 now
Umar Gul to Hopes, no run short again, outside off this time, mistimes a pull to midwicket
Umar Gul to Hopes, 1 run slower ball bowled short outside off, chops it down to deep cover
Umar Gul to Hilfenhaus, no run low full toss outside off, pushes at it, gets an under edge and Akmal leaps to snap it well over his head, saved a certain four there
Malik to Hopes, 1 run short on the off, gets back and pushes it wide of midwicket for a single
Malik to Hilfenhaus, no run doosra, deals it well, spun away but he let it go
Malik to Hilfenhaus, no run too short, too wide, Hilfy has no reason to play at it
Malik to Hilfenhaus, 1 run tucks it away behind square for a single
Malik to Hopes, SIX runs shot! Wasn't quite to the pitch but struck it cleanly, tossed up on the off, bend down and slog-sweeps it over deep midwicket, crucial innings this
Malik to Hopes, 1 run dabs it behind square for a single to keep the strike, he's just one hit away from a well-made fifty here
Umar Gul to Hopes, 1 run overpitched on the off stump, hits it through the line to long-off, Hilfy wants a second but is sent back wisely
Umar Gul to Hilfenhaus, 1 run Hilfy plays the pull, and does so well, short on the off and he drags it to deep square leg
Umar Gul to Hopes, no run slower one outside off, bowled at 116 kmph, has a massive heave at it, misses, didn't pick it there
Umar Gul to Hopes, 1 run length ball on the off, pushed uppishly towards long-off
Umar Gul to Hilfenhaus, OUT gone! Cleaned him up, straight on middle, he played across the line to work that wide of midwicket, missed it, clipped the pads and crashed into middle and off

Excellent effort from Pakistan, and they owe it to Afridi - he leads the team off the field - and Ajmal for restricting Australia to a paltry score. Australia started well, particularly with Haddin and Watson getting them to a strong position, but once spin was introduced into the attack, they collapsed.
The Pakistan openers are walking out. We'll have around 20-25 minutes of play before the players take a break. Butt's facing Bracken. Kamran Akmal is at the non-striker's end. Two slips in place
Bracken to Salman Butt, no run on target immediately, good length on middle and leg, defends it back to the bowler
Bracken to Salman Butt, no run shaping it away from the left hander, landed on a good length outside off and moved away as he left it alone

Bracken to Salman Butt, no run got the leading edge there, pitched it full on leg stump and got some late movement to get the edge as he tried to drive it through the leg side, missed out on a single there, was in the gap
Bracken to Salman Butt, no run lands on a length on the off, eases it through to mid-off
Bracken to Salman Butt, FOUR runs sweetly timed, just a fraction overpitched, gets to the pitch and punches it between point and cover, Pakistan are away
Bracken to Salman Butt, 1 run drew him forward with a good length ball on the off, opened the face to play it down to third man
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run on the off stump, held its line, defended down to point
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run good length on the off, bowled at 135.9 kmph, gets forward and blocks it to cover
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run short on the off stump, chops it down straight to point

Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, OUT he's given him! Australia strike early, landed on a good length on middle and leg and came on quickly to Butt as it swung in to rap him on the pads on the back foot, struck him in line with leg stump and the umpire Nadeem Ghauri raised his finger immediately
Hilfenhaus to Younis, 1 run full and wide, swinging away, steers it down to third man for a single
Hilfenhaus to Kamran, no run low full toss on the off stump, bowled at 131.5 kmph, presents the full face to push it to cover
Bracken to Younis, no run moved back in to beat the bat, landed on a good length just outside off and darted back in as he leaned forward to drive, wasn
Bracken to Younis, no run much fuller and he attempts a similar shot, the bat turns in his hand and it rolls down to midwicket
Bracken to Younis, no run inswinger again, gets forward to defend, brushes the pads on the way to the keeper, not looked entirely convincing here
Bracken to Younis, no run held its line this time, he got to the pitch and defended it to cover, much better
Bracken to Younis, no run reaching for it outside off, not really pacy, bowled at 126.6 kmph, but accurate, dabs it back to the bowler
Bracken to Younis, no run angling it back into the right hander, gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
Hilfenhaus to Kamran, no run short on the off stump, gets back and drops it short of midwicket
Hilfenhaus to Kamran, no run back of a length again, straight on middle, bowled at 139.9 kmph, gets back and defends solidly
Hilfenhaus to Kamran, no run short of a length outside off, kept low as it swung away, Akmal could not bring his bat down in time
Hilfenhaus to Kamran, no run moved away sharply to beat the outside edge, Akmal prodded at it, was almost done in by the swing
Hilfenhaus to Kamran, no run short on the off stump, defended to cover, good start here, but they don't seem to have enough to defend
Hilfenhaus to Kamran, no run pushing him back again with a short one, he negotiates it well, getting behind it nicely and blocking it into the off side
Bracken to Younis, no run good length on the off and moving away to beat the outside edge, Younis moves across and opens the face but misses
Bracken to Younis, no run a touch fuller, gets forward and guides it to point, they
Bracken to Younis, FOUR runs a fraction full on middle, got forward and chipped it firmly over mid-on for a boundary, that will relieve the pressure a little
Bracken to Younis, no run presents the full face to drive it straight to mid-off, overpitched again
Bracken to Younis, no run getting it to leave the right hander, bowled at 119.1 kmph, hangs his bat out, gets the inside edge onto his pads
Bracken to Younis, 1 run gets a single, waits for it and dabs it towards third man to keep the strike
Hilfenhaus to Younis, no run back of a length on middle, drops it short of the bowler and calls for a single, is sent back
Hilfenhaus to Younis, no run held it back again, got forward and tapped it to cover, taking his time here
Hilfenhaus to Younis, no run slightly short on middle, pushed to midwicket off the front foot
Hilfenhaus to Younis, 1 run banged in short, gets back and drops it with soft hands towards third man
Hilfenhaus to Kamran, (no ball) FOUR runs crashed through the off side, what's more he
Hilfenhaus to Kamran, FOUR runs poor ball, in the slot outside off, steps away and slices it wide of point, that should normalize things a little
Hilfenhaus to Kamran, no run short on the off, gets back and defends it watchfully towards cover
Hopes to Younis, no run length ball on the off stump, driven through the line to mid-off
Hopes to Younis, no run angling it into the right hander, gets forward and taps it between point and cover
Hopes to Younis, no run probing him on and outside the off stump, but not getting much movement, dabs it into the off side
Hopes to Younis, no run came back in this time, Younis tried to cover it by getting outside the line, got an inside edge onto his pads

Hopes to Younis, FOUR runs oooh, almost! Short of a length outside off and swung away, played away from his body there, opened the face to play it just wide of a diving slip for a boundary, lucky, and he's still there
Hopes to Younis, no run good length on the off, gets forward and punches it to cover
Clark to Kamran, no run straying on the pads, tries to clip it away, misses
Clark to Kamran, no run beaten, landed on a good length outside off and shot up, and swung away as he got back to defend
Clark to Kamran, no run held it back and got it to move away, played away from his body there, missed
Clark to Kamran, 4 leg byes isn't getting his direction right here, on the pads again, tries to whip it fine, brushes the pads on the way to the fine-leg boundary
Clark to Kamran, no run on middle and off, gets forward and drives it straight to cover
Clark to Kamran, no run back of a length on middle, bowled at 135 kmph, defended to midwicket
Hopes to Younis, no run on middle and leg, bounced up to him, struck him on the ribs as he tried to play it on the leg side
Hopes to Younis, no run on the off stump, leans forward and pushes it to cover
Hopes to Younis, no run back of a length on middle, punched to mid-on off the back foot
Hopes to Younis, no run shortish outside off, gentle medium at around 128 kmph, hit to cover, a quiet start this
Hopes to Younis, no run shortish outside off, moves across a touch and dabs it towards point
Hopes to Younis, no run reaches into the drive but isn't able to beat the in-field, stylishly played, but straight to cover
Clark to Kamran, FOUR runs gets the outside edge well wide of slip, slightly short and moves away, he plays at it with soft hands, got some good bounce there but Pakistan will take that
Clark to Kamran, no run back of a length on the off, jumps up and defends it in front of cover
Clark to Kamran, no run on middle and leg, getting it to jag back in, bowled much fuller, at 138 kmph, pushed back with a full face
Clark to Kamran, no run slowed it down and got it to cut away from the batsman, at around 120 kmph, Akmal played at it but was beaten
Clark to Kamran, no run on middle stump, gets back and punches it wide of midwicket, things have slowed down a little here, but Pakistan have ample time
Clark to Kamran, no run angling it into the right hander, banged in on the off stump, defended to point
Hopes to Younis, no run fullish on the off, gets on the front foot and bunts it to mid-off
Hopes to Kamran, no run swinging back in, short on the off, punches it back to the bowler
Hopes to Kamran, 1 run good length on the off and getting it to move away a hint, gets forward and plays hard, takes the outside edge, but all along the ground to third man
Hopes to Malik, no run nipping it back in, bowled at 130.9 kmph, shaping in nicely but its wide enough for the batsman to let it go
Hopes to Malik, no run short down the leg side, clips his thighs on the way to Haddin, nice tight over that, it's getting interesting here
Hauritz to Kamran, no run tossed up on the off, gets across and drives it to midwicket
Hauritz to Kamran, no run flighted outside off, inviting him forward, driven to cover
Hauritz to Kamran, 1 run struck away wide of cover for a single
Hauritz to Malik, 1 run gave it air, played it with a closed face wide of the close-in fielder on the leg side for a single
Hauritz to Kamran, 1 run tossed up on the off stump, driven firmly but it's fielded well at short cover
Hauritz to Malik, 2 runs on middle and leg, gets his foot forward and places it in the gap between deep midwicket and long-on for a couple
Hopes to Kamran, no run short on the off, gets back and punches it to cover
Hopes to Kamran, 1 run short and wide, slashes it away to third man
Hopes to Malik, no run angling it in from wide of the crease, defended back to the bowler
Hopes to Malik, 1 run slightly short outside off, a touch too close to cut but he plays it well, opening the face at the last moment to play it down to third man
Hopes to Kamran, no run slower one bowled full outside off, at 116 kmph, pushed uppishly towards cover, who's right at the edge f the circle
Hopes to Kamran, 1 run too straight, gets across and tickles it down to fine leg
Hauritz to Kamran, FOUR runs they've handled Hauritz well so far, this one's a touch full and he launched into the drive, striking it confidently between cover and mid-off
Hauritz to Kamran, 1 run flighted on the off, reaches forward and pushes it towards deep cover
Hauritz to Malik, no run much flatter, on and outside off, gets forward and plays it back to the bowler
Hauritz to Malik, 1 run tossed up outside off, dabbed wide of point for a single, runs coming a little more freely now
Hauritz to Kamran, 3 runs quicker one bowled full outside off, played it well, moved away and dug it out behind point with an open face to get three more, brings up the 50
Hauritz to Malik, no run flat and full on the off, defended in the direction of point
Clark to Kamran, no run he's accurate, on middle and off, defended to cover
Clark to Kamran, no run good length on the off, gets forward and dabs it to point, you're not going to score so easily off him
Clark to Kamran, no run just a fraction wide, is into the drive, the bat turns in his hand it rolls down wide of midwicket
Clark to Kamran, 1 run short of a good length on the off, has no trouble playing down to third man
Clark to Malik, 2 runs straying in line for once, full on the pads, flicked away wide of deep midwicket for a couple
Clark to Malik, no run slightly short outside off, moving back in, left alone to the keeper
Hauritz to Kamran, 1 run flighted, converts it into a low full toss and slices it away to deep point
Hauritz to Malik, no run tossed up on the off, gets forward and defends it back to the bowler
Hauritz to Malik, no run presents the full face and pushes it back to the bowler again
Hauritz to Malik, no run pushed through fuller, dabbed back onto the pitch
Hauritz to Malik, no run short on middle, gets back and drops it down to short leg
Hauritz to Malik, no run quicker through the air, bowled flat on the off, spun back in and he defended it back onto the pitch

Clark to Kamran, FOUR runs improvisation, just a fraction full on the off, got across and whipped it away over midwicket, nice use of the wrists there, a touch risky but he was confident of pulling it off
Clark to Kamran, no run short on the off, pushed back to the bowler
Clark to Kamran, no run offcutter, bowled at 120.1 kmph, dropped dead on the pitch, back to tuk tuk cricket
Clark to Kamran, no run or maybe not, he forces it through the off side, overpitched and plays it uppishly on the bounce to mid-off
Clark to Kamran, no run nipped back in, short on the off, punches it to point off the back foot
Clark to Kamran, no run slower offcutter again, bowled at 124.9 kmph, drops it on the pitch, it rolls back towards the stumps but he brings his foot in the way to prevent any damage
Hauritz to Malik, 1 run nicely done, pushed through quick on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
Hauritz to Kamran, FOUR runs Akmal's getting a move-on, attacking Hauritz here, quicker and full on the off, is down the track and clatters it past a diving mid-off
Hauritz to Kamran, no run tossed up this time, leans forward and defends with bat close to pad
Hauritz to Kamran, no run short on middle, gets back and pushes it to midwicket
Hauritz to Kamran, no run kept low, and he did well to get his bat down in time, dropped it back to Hauritz
Hauritz to Kamran, no run much fuller, pushed to cover, quietened down after that boundary, but this rate will do
Clark to Malik, no run Malik flirts with her outside off and is beaten, short and wide, got some movement away, and some bounce to beat the edge as tried to chop at that one
Clark to Malik, no run fuller, but a harmless delivery, too wide to induce the batsman into playing the shot, left alone
Clark to Malik, 1 run short on middle, gets back, leaps and closes the face to play it down to fine leg
Clark to Kamran, no run short of a good length outside off, bowled at 135 kmph, chases it as it swings away, misses
Clark to Kamran, 1 run shout for lbw, the faint inside edge saves him, slower one on middle, tries to hit that through the line, got a nick onto his pads
Clark to Malik, no run stopped on him a little, had shaped himself for a pull but probably thought that wasn't short enough,adjusted well to just drop it into the off side
Hilfenhaus to Kamran, no run short on the off, gets back and bunts it to cover
Hilfenhaus to Kamran, no run banged in short again, goes for the pull, it's onto him a little too quickly, is struck on the thighs
Hilfenhaus to Kamran, FOUR runs lucky, but it's runs, banged in short again, tries to clear square leg, bounces more than he expected, gets the top edge over the keeper, was bowled quick
Hilfenhaus to Kamran, no run four consecutive short ones, punched to midwicket this time

Hilfenhaus to Kamran, FOUR runs shot of the innings! Pushes it full this time and he picks the length early, makes way and hits it inside out wide of mid-off, bisects the gap between mid-off and cover perfectly
Hilfenhaus to Kamran, no run back to short again, dabbed in front of cover
Clark to Malik, no run spat off the pitch, short on middle and Malik was in a spot of bother, just blocks it in front of his face and it lobs up on the off side
Clark to Malik, no run good length on the off this time, bowled at 136.4 kmph, defended solidly to cover
Clark to Malik, 3 runs too straight, bowling to Malik's strength, driven firmly wide of midwicket, Bracken gives chase and drags it back, but they've taken three
Clark to Kamran, FOUR runs short and wide, not too wide to cut, he plays the shot anyway, gets the outside edge, there's no slip and it races away to the third-man boundary
Clark to Kamran, no run in the channel outside off, gets forward and plays it to point with an open face

Clark to Kamran, OUT gone this time! Took a chance once too often, similar ball to the one that was edged for four earlier in the over, but gets some movement away from the batsman, Akmal goes after it, gets a thick edge and Haddin pouches it well moving to his right
Hilfenhaus to Malik, no run on the off stump, gets back and punches it down to cover
Hilfenhaus to Malik, no run short of a length on the off, pushed to cover again
Hilfenhaus to Malik, 1 run on middle and leg, turns it away to fine leg for a single
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run bouncer banged in on middle, bowled at 137 kmph, ducks under it well
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run short on leg, tries to fend it away wide of square leg, is hit on the thighs
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run back of a length on the off, punched to cover off the back foot, things have quietened down now
Clark to Malik, no run good length on the off stump, gets forward and defends it cautiously to cover
Clark to Malik, no run went through him quickly, short outside off, too close to cut but he tries to do just that, bounced to just beat the outside edge
Clark to Malik, no run too wide and he cuts it firmly this time, but straight to Clarke at point
Clark to Malik, 1 run a little slower and almost had him, on middle and he played it inside out just wide of short cover, gets a single but would have been worried for a second
Clark to Misbah, 1 run nicely played, a touch too full, gets across and clips it towards deep square leg for a single
Clark to Malik, no run jagged back in, mistimes a cut to cover, bowled at 135 kmph
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run short on middle, gets behind it and blocks it to mid-on
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run moves across and turns it away straight to square leg
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run good length on the off, pushes it back to the bowler
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run bouncer banged in on middle, he ducks under it, one for the over, another dot ball
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run jumped off the pitch but he dealt with the bounce well, getting across and dropping it on the off side
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run short of a good length on the off, pushed back to the bowler, a nice little maiden
Bracken to Malik, no run good length outside off, angling away from the right hander, left alone
Bracken to Malik, no run slower one, bowled at 110 kmph, defended with a reach to cover
Bracken to Malik, 1 run short on the off, late-cuts it down to third man
Bracken to Misbah, 1 run slower one again, cutting away from the right hander, he moves across and runs it down again
Bracken to Malik, no run bowled on a length on the off, drawing him forward, plays it to cover
Bracken to Malik, 1 run fuller on the off, driven firmly but fielded brilliantly at short cover, another tidy over
Hilfenhaus to Malik, 2 runs short and wide, leaving the right hander, he reaches for it, gets a thick edge wide of slip and third man for a couple
Hilfenhaus to Malik, no run good length on the off, bowled at 137 kmph, defended solidly to cover
Hilfenhaus to Malik, no run slower offcutter, bowled at 113 kmph, pushed through to mid-on
Hilfenhaus to Malik, no run bouncer banged in short on middle, Malik ducks under it comfortably
Hilfenhaus to Malik, 1 run kept a little low, short on middle, turned it wide of square leg for a single
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run short on the off, chopped down to cover, taking time these two
Bracken to Malik, no run good length on the off, reaches forward and plays it to point
Bracken to Malik, no run on middle and off, gets on the front foot and blocks
Bracken to Malik, no run short of a good length outside off, dabbed down to point
Bracken to Malik, FOUR runs gentle medium that, bowled at 114 kmph, short and wide and he seizes the chance, makes room and cuts it away between point and cover
Bracken to Malik, no run much quicker, at 130.8 kmph, drops it wide of the keeper from the crease
Bracken to Malik, no run good length on the off, stretches forward and defends to cover
Hopes to Misbah, no run almost gets a wicket! Edged and just short of Haddin, good length on the off, came back in and kissed the outside edge as he tried to angle it to third man
Hopes to Misbah, no run defended into the off side off the back foot
Hopes to Misbah, no run much fuller, bowled at 127.4 kmph, defended to cover
Hopes to Misbah, no run short of a good length on the off, blocked to cover
Hopes to Misbah, no run teasing him outside off, overpitching it this time, left alone, Misbah taking no risks here
Hopes to Misbah, FOUR runs finally, short on the off, moves across, rolls his wrists over it to play it down towards the fine-leg boundary, that should get him going, Pakistan inch towards 100
Bracken to Malik, no run pushed through quick, held its line as it was angled away from the batsman, Malik pushed at it, missed
Bracken to Malik, 1 run pitched outside leg and came back in, turned away to deep square leg
Bracken to Misbah, no run short on the off, gets back and guides it to point
Bracken to Misbah, no run leaves it alone, good length outside off and angling away, let through to the keeper
Bracken to Misbah, no run much fuller, gets across and taps it back to the bowler
Bracken to Misbah, no run left alone again, pacy at around 138 kmph, wide enough for him to let it go
Hopes to Malik, no run fullish on the off, moves across and pushes it back to Hopes
Hopes to Malik, no run fullish outside off, gets forward and taps it to cover, who's at the edge of the circle

Hopes to Malik, OUT edged and Haddin takes a stunning catch! Tried to flirt with it and paid the price, a legcutter landing short outside off, he tried to run that past the keeper but couldn't get it wide enough, Haddin dived to his right, and dived low, to pluck that with his right hand inches fr
Hopes to Afridi, no run beaten straightaway, and they've actually appealed, zipped away after pitching short on the off, he was pushed back as he tried to defend and was beaten as it spar away
Hopes to Afridi, 1 run went after it, pushed fuller and he swings across the line, gets a thick inside edge to deep square leg, 100 up
Hopes to Misbah, 2 runs shortish on middle and off, moves across and works it away fine, fine-leg is too square and they grab a couple
Clark to Afridi, FOUR runs poor ball and he's away, full toss on leg stump and he whips it away with his wrists over square leg, things should speed up now
Clark to Afridi, FOUR runs the crowd is roaring now, short outside off, stayed his ground and pulled it away over midwicket, why didn't he come in earlier?
Clark to Afridi, no run cramped him this time and he played it well, good length on the off and he defended it solidly in front of the bowler
Clark to Afridi, 2 runs Boycott is having a hearty laugh inside the commentary box, swung at it across the line, got a thick outside edge and it spun away from third man to give them an extra run
Clark to Afridi, no run slower one outside off, bowled at 121.6 kmph, walked across to dab it down, missed
Clark to Afridi, no run short of a good length on the off, defended to cover off the back foot, right, so the buzz is back
Hopes to Misbah, no run slower ball probing him outside off, he flirts with it, misses
Hopes to Misbah, no run short of a good length on the off, pushed to cover
Hopes to Misbah, no run gets forward and guides it towards point
Hopes to Misbah, no run length ball on the off, moves across and drives it to midwicket
Hopes to Misbah, no run short on the off, just pokes at it without much intent
Hopes to Misbah, 1 run short on middle, works it away towards deep square leg, much to the chagrin of the crowd who must have wanted the more explosive partner to take strike
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run short of a good length outside off, at 131.3 kmph, left alone
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run back of a length on middle, fends it away on the leg side
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run short on middle, punched to midwicket on the back foot

Hilfenhaus to Misbah, 1 run banged in short on the off, rolls his wrists over it to play it to fine leg
Hilfenhaus to Afridi, no run short outside off, left alone to the keeper, crowd go silent as MIsbah takes strike the next over
Hopes to Misbah, 1 run slower one, an offcutter bowled at 111.3 kmph, guided to third man wide of a diving gully
Hopes to Afridi, no run good length on middle, defends it respectfully back to Hopes
Hopes to Afridi, 1 run slower one bowled short on the off, turned away behind square for a single
Hopes to Misbah, no run full on the off, driven through the line to mid-off
Hopes to Misbah, no run appeal for lbw, short and nipped back in, tries to chop it down, is hit on the pads but well outside the line
Hopes to Misbah, FOUR runs finally, overpitched and he's onto it, presents the full face as he drills that down the ground to beat mid-off

Hilfenhaus to Afridi, FOUR runs Afridi wants to be done with this, not quite to the pitch but has a good go at it, takes it from outside off and swings it over midwicket, wide of mid-on for a boundary
Hilfenhaus to Afridi, FOUR runs Hopes misfields and concedes a boundary, overpitched on the off, driven firmly down the ground but mid-off could not get his body behind it, four more
Hilfenhaus to Afridi, 1 wide called a wide, too high, banged in short and Haddin leapt to pluck it with one hand
Hilfenhaus to Afridi, (no ball) he can't get his hand onto it now, bouncer on leg stump and it spat off, no chance for the keeper, and that
Hilfenhaus to Afridi, FOUR runs we're heading for a speedy finish now, full on the off, length ball and he's smashed it down the ground, all power in that and poor Hopes has no chance at mid-off
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, 1 leg bye short on leg stump, tries to turn it fine, gets a leg bye
Hilfenhaus to Jamshed, no run short of a good length on the off, gets back and drops it towards , 19 off that over
Hauritz to Misbah, 1 run short on the off stump, moves across and works it wide of short fine
Hauritz to Jamshed, no run the straighter one, coming round the wicket, on the off stump, dabbed into the off side
Hauritz to Jamshed, no run zipped away from him, good length on the off, drew him forward, spun away to beat the outside edge
Hauritz to Jamshed, no run stopped on him, bowled straight, much slower through the air, pushed at it hard and it lobbed up just short of mid-off
Hauritz to Jamshed, no run tossed up, well wide of the off, left alone
Hauritz to Jamshed, no run on the off stump, drifting into the left hander, defended with a lunge
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run short of a good length on the off, blocked to point off the back foot
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run slower ball bowled on a length on the off, at 113.4 kmph, pushed to cover, Misbah continues his merry way
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run short on the off, punched to mid-on off the back foot
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run short on middle, gets back and drops it dead on the pitch
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run sharp bouncer, took the batsman by surprise, and even Haddin, Misbah backed down and Haddin leapt to take it well above his head
Hilfenhaus to Misbah, no run turned to midwicket off the back foot, finishes his spell, but that 19-run over spoilt it for him
Hauritz to Jamshed, 2 runs full and wide, drives at it hard, spins away to take the outside edge wide of slip, a bit of hesitation keeps them down to just a couple, when they should have run three
Hauritz to Jamshed, no run short on the off, swatted down to mid-on
Hauritz to Jamshed, no run pushed through to cover off the front foot
Hauritz to Jamshed, FOUR runs gifts them a boundary, tossed up well outside leg and Jamshed sweeps it to help it on its way to the fine-leg boundary
Hauritz to Jamshed, no run slightly quicker on leg stump and angling down, catches him on the thigs
Hauritz to Jamshed, no run flighted on middle, reaches forward to defend it back to the bowler
Bracken to Misbah, no run good length outside off and angling away, left alone
Bracken to Misbah, no run on and outside off, at 131.3 kmph, defended to cover
Bracken to Misbah, no run slower one at 114.8 kmph bowled full on the off, walks across and defends it into the leg side
Bracken to Misbah, no run short of a length outside off, lets it through to the keeper

Bracken to Misbah, no run short outside off again, leaving the right hander, Misbah moves across, tempting the crowd as though he's going to play it but just at the last moment, when they're praying he goes after it, he shoulders his arms
Bracken to Misbah, no run on middle and leg, pushed through to midwicket, he's in blocking mode today, difficult to change one's frame of mind
Symonds to Jamshed, 3 runs short and wide, poor start, Jamshed rocks back and forces it past cover for three runs
Symonds to Misbah, 2 runs good running, on middle and leg, punched wide of midwicket, the fielder in the deep is a little slow to react and they scamper back for the second
Symonds to Misbah, 1 run pushed to midwicket and there's a fumble by Ferguson, they get a single
Symonds to Umar Gul, no run almost a caught-and-bowled there, short on the off and spun back in, pushed it uppishly just short of a diving Symonds, would have been interesting had that been taken
Symonds to Umar Gul, 1 run tossed up outside off, gets forward and defends it wide of point
Bracken to Umar Gul, no run good length outside off and moving away, left alone to the keeper
Bracken to Umar Gul, 1 run full and wide, goes after it, gets a thick edge over the slips towards third man for a single
Bracken to Misbah, no run short of a good length, moves across to dab it to third man, it zips past him to beat the outside edge
Bracken to Misbah, 1 run moves well across, it's fired in on middle and leg, got his bat to it somehow to play it to fine leg, Bracken saw him shuffle there
Bracken to Umar Gul, no run on the off stump, gets forward and defends to cover
Bracken to Umar Gul, no run slower one bowled on a good length on the off, defended watchfully
Symonds to Misbah, no run on middle and off, gets across and tickles it to square leg
Symonds to Misbah, 1 run short on the off, punched down past a diving midwicket where a fumble by Hauritz allows them a single
Symonds to Umar Gul, no run flighted outside off, gets forward and defends solidly
Symonds to Umar Gul, 2 runs almost dragged it on! Tossed up and turned in sharply, he got back to dab that past the keeper, got an inside edge just wide of the off stump, two more to fine leg
Symonds to Umar Gul, no run short outside off and held its line, he got back, expecting it to spin into him, it doesn't and he misses
Symonds to Umar Gul, no run on the off stump, lunges forward and blocks
Bracken to Misbah, no run came back in, good length on the off and caught him on the ribs as he came forward to defend
Bracken to Misbah, no run short on middle and off, gets across to defend to cover
Bracken to Misbah, no run back of a length outside off, bowled at 132.2 kmph, left alone
Bracken to Misbah, 1 run slower one bowled full on the off stump, driven wide of the bowler to mid-off, Gul appears to be struggling for a bit but he's made it comfortably
Bracken to Umar Gul, no run gets forward and taps it down to mid-off, good bounce, but handled well
Bracken to Umar Gul, no run struck well, got forward and punched it wide of mid-off for a single, less than ten needed now
Symonds to Misbah, no run flighted on the off, gets across and pushes it back to the bowler
Symonds to Misbah, no run closes the face and works it to square leg
Symonds to Misbah, no run does it again, flighted outside off, gets across and nudges it to square leg
Symonds to Misbah, FOUR runs finally, short on the off, waits for it to spin into him, rocks back and pulls it away wide of a diving square leg
Symonds to Misbah, FOUR runs four more, flighted on the off stump, gets forward and chips it well over midwicket to beat the fielder in the deep for a boundary
Symonds to Misbah, no run full outside off, he's already made room, drilled straight to cover
Bracken to Umar Gul, FOUR runs It's all over, just a fraction full on the off, he swings across the line to clear mid-on to finish this off

That's all we have from here folks. Thanks for tuning in and sending us your feedback. Join us again on Friday for the second ODI. Until then, on behalf of everyone at Cricinfo, it's goodbye from Siddhartha Talya. Cheers!
There are a zillion people on the presentation podium. Shahid Afridi is the Man of the Match. No surprises there.

Australia will try to bat hard at the nets, facing their spinners and using their feet a lot more to get some much needed practice ahead of their second match. Hold fire, and we'll bring you the details from the presentation shortly.

A morale-boosting win for Pakistan after all that has happened in the recent months. Australia were in control early on, but were dented by a six-wicket burst from Shahid Afridi. Though they did fight back well to make Pakistan work for their runs, a score of 168 never looked threatening. Kamran Akmal wa
Pakistan won by 4 wickets (with 35 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Shahid Afridi, PAK
